mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_HIT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_IMAGENAME) VALUES (#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, '0', CURDATE(), #{notice_imagename})
INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_HIT, FAQ_DATE) VALUES (#{faq_title}, #{faq_content}, '0', CURDATE())
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_HIT = NOTICE_HIT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no}
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_HIT = FAQ_HIT + 1 WHERE FAQ_NO = #{faq_no}
mapper.select: SELECT *FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO IN ( (SELECT NOTICE_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO <#{notice_no} ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT NOTICE_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO>#{notice_no} LIMIT 1)) ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT *FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO IN ( (SELECT FAQ_NO FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO <#{faq_no} ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT FAQ_NO FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO>#{faq_no} LIMIT 1)) ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
